attributes.action: To allow family member the right to travel to stay for five day
attributes.additional_details: Help us get the five day rules bk plz
attributes.background: To let us have the five day rule back over the Christmas to spend with loved ones instead off one day which is no good

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign some of these petitions:

Reinstate the 5-day relaxation of COVID restrictions over Christmas: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/564204

Allow families to have Christmas day together in all tiers: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/564312
